verses.name: John 11:46
verses.text: But some of them went their ways to the Pharisees, and told them what things Jesus had done.

verses.name: John 11:47
verses.text: Then gathered the chief priests and the Pharisees a council, and said, What do we? for this man doeth many miracles.

verses.name: John 11:48
verses.text: If we let him thus alone, all men will believe on him: and the Romans shall come and take away both our place and nation.

verses.name: John 11:49
verses.text: And one of them, named Caiaphas, being the high priest that same year, said unto them, Ye know nothing at all,
